meanings.sent1: She untidies her room by leaving clothes on the floor.
meanings.sent2: The children always untidy the living room after playing.
meanings.sent3: His attempt to untidy the perfectly arranged books made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The wind untidies the neatly raked leaves in the yard.
meanings.sent5: The mischievous puppy untidies the freshly folded laundry.

meanings.sent1: The kitchen quickly untidies after a big cooking session.
meanings.sent2: The garden untidies after a heavy rainstorm.
meanings.sent3: The once spotless room untidies itself when the kids come home.
meanings.sent4: The artist's studio untidies as creativity flows freely.
meanings.sent5: The playground untidies as children play and explore.
